span.span: is itself an type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供要啟用建立的自訂集合型別，完全支援資料繫結變更通知，屬性失效，以及其內容的動畫。This class is provided to enable the creation of custom collection types that fully support data binding, change notification, property invalidation, and animation of its contents. ### FreezableCollection 的 XAML 用法XAML Usage for FreezableCollection 支援有限[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]語法。 supports a limited [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax. - 在根物件項目，您可以理論上指定受條件約束物件項目，也必須指定[X:typearguments 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md)宣告條件約束。As an object element at the root, you can theoretically specify an unconstrained object element, which must also specify the [x:TypeArguments Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md) to declare the constraint. 不過，這並不常見的案例中，因為若要這樣做，必須是根項目。However, this is not a common scenario, because to do this, the must be the root element. 這項限制存在是因為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器實作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]只可支援[X:typearguments 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md)時要設定的項目是根元素，而且您必須使用上任何開啟如果您想要具現化泛型類型中的條件約束泛型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This limitation exists because the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] can only support [x:TypeArguments Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive.md) when the element it is being set on is the root element, and you must use on any open constraint generic if you want to instantiate a generic type in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 不太可能要是根項目，成為鬆散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。It is unlikely that you want a as the root element, even as loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. - 如果您是衍生自和套用中將衍生集合的類型條件約束，請將衍生的集合可以支援各種不同的使用方式。If you derive from and apply a type constraint in the derived collection, the derived collection can support a variety of usages. 這可能是因為您衍生中的條件約束就不需要傳遞。This is possible because the constraint in your derivation eliminates the need to pass . - 一般[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用量這類衍生的集合是透過隱含的集合語法。The typical [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage for such a derived collection is through implicit collection syntax. 若要指定為物件項目集合本身不需要支援特定介面的集合。Collections that support certain interfaces do not need to specify the collection itself as an object element. 如需詳細資訊，在集合中的語法上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，請參閱[XAML 語法的詳細資料](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。For details on collection syntax in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md). 比方說，*物件*與*屬性*其中*屬性*類型受到可以支援下列語法：For instance, an *object* with a *property* where the *property* was of type constrained by could support the following syntax: ``` ``` - 只要您不要隱藏預設的建構函式，將衍生的集合也可以支援物件項目語法 （其中的物件項目是明確的而不是隱含的使用方式，如上所示）。As long as you do not hide the default constructor, the derived collection can also support an object element syntax (where the object element is explicit, as opposed to the implicit usage shown above). 不需要是根項目。It does not need to be the root element. 或者，您也可以使用當做根項目，衍生的集合，而不需要指定，雖然使用集合做為根項目是很常見。Or, you can also use the derived collection as a root element, without needing to specify , although using a collection as a root element is uncommon. - 在上述案例中擇一集合的任何子項目必須是類型的任一個實作條件約束，或所指定。Any child elements of the collection in either of the above scenarios must be of the type of either the implemented constraint, or as specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業執行的淺層複本上指定的集合。只複製集合的項目參考，項目本身不會被複製。This operation performs a shallow copy on the specified collection; only references to the collection's elements are copied, the elements themselves are not cloned. 修改新的項目也會修改針對該項目`collection`。Modifying an element of the new also modifies that element for `collection`. 項目會放在新讀取指定之集合的列舉值的順序相同。The elements are placed in the new in the same order they are read by the enumerator of the specified collection.

The copy's value is .

[!code-csharp[freezablesample_procedural#CreateInstanceCoreExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/freezablesample_procedural/CSharp/freezablesample.cs#createinstancecoreexample)] [!code-vb[freezablesample_procedural#CreateInstanceCoreExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/freezablesample_procedural/visualbasic/freezablesample.vb#createinstancecoreexample)]

span.span: If is , this method returns if the if the specified is now unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.
